import React from 'react' import './header.style.css' import {Link } from 'react-router-dom' import {ReactComponent as Logo} from '../../assets/crown.svg' import {auth} from '../../firebase/firebase.utils' import {connect} from 'react-redux'; import CartIcon from '../' const Header = ({currentUser}) => (
SHOP SHOP { currentUser ?
auth.signOut()}> Sign Out
: Sign In }
) const mapStateToProps = (state) => ({ currentUser: state.user.currentUser, }) export default connect(mapStateToProps)(Header);
